title: Mr Shepard & Mr Milne = Mr Shepard and Mr Milne
creator_credit: E.P. Dutton, Weston Woods Studios, Andrew Holmes Productions and Andrew Holmes
brief_description: This film recreates the book world of Winnie the Pooh and the two men who gave it life. Illustrator Ernest Shepard reminisces about his collaboration with writer A.A. Milne on four books between the years 1923-1928, including “When we were very young”, “Winnie-the-Pooh”, “The House at Pooh Corner”, and “Now we are six”. Cast includes David Horovitch as the young Ernest Shepard and Richard Kay as A.A. Milne.
